snippet.title: Swift: Twitter - Headers, Cells, and Footers (Ep 1)
snippet.description:
Welcome to the introduction of a very exciting series on how to build out the Twitter application.  In today's video, we're going to go through very quickly how to build out the basic layout of our home feed. We'll be doing so using UICollectionViewController and rendering cells, a header, and a footer.

Enjoy.

More on UICollectionView:
https://www.letsbuildthatapp.com/course_video?id=572

Completed Source Code: 
https://www.letsbuildthatapp.com/course_video?id=662

Follow me on Twitter https://www.twitter.com/buildthatapp
